name: Alchemyst Versus
description:
Presentation

Alchemy-versus is a simple "local-multiplayer versus" game.
You play an alchemist, who want to prove... that he is the best !
Challenge your friend in this memory puzzle game to find who is the best alchemist !

How to play ?

 In the top-left corner of the screen you have three informations: the image of the potion you need to make, the percentage of ingredients filled and the number of potions you've already made.
In the top-right corner of the screen you have one information: how much potion your opponents had already made ! Take care, you need to be the first !

In the bottom-right you have 4 icons (the option icon is not implemented for the moment).

  •     The first icon (the chest) is your inventory, click on it and you will see your ingredients. Hover an ingredient and his name will be prompted in the bottom-left corner. Click on an ingredient and after click on the slot where you want to put it. Right click will remove the actual ingredient.
      
  • The second icon (the sheet) is your cookbook, you can access it only into "Normal" mode. Into it you can access all the potion receipts.

In the bottom-left you have 4 quick-slots, put item you selected into the inventory here and after this put them into the pot.

Once you have put the ingredient you need into the quick-slots, click again on ingredient and click on the pot to put in it. But warning ! If you put too much ingredient or wrong ingredient the potion will be reset !

The first player who make the selected amount of potions (by default 10) win.

It's the end, you're ready to play ;)
